mapper.insert: insert into odc.review (program_progSeq, user_userNumber, reviewDate, reviewRate, likeCount, reviewComment, uploadLocation) values (#{program_progSeq}, #{user_userNumber}, #{reviewDate}, #{reviewRate}, #{likeCount}, #{reviewComment}, #{uploadLocation})
mapper.delete: delete from odc.review where program_progSeq = #{program_progSeq} and user_userNumber = #{user_userNumber}
mapper.update: update odc.review set reviewDate = #{reviewDate}, reviewRate = #{reviewRate}, reviewComment = #{reviewComment}, uploadLocation = #{uploadLocation} where program_progSeq = #{program_progSeq} and user_userNumber = #{user_userNumber}
